title: Postponement of Frontiers in Cardiovascular Biomedicine (FCVB) 2020 due to COVID-19: a look forward to 2021.

similar.title: General practitioners as frontiers in COVID-19: The Hong Kong experience.
text: General practitioners as frontiers in COVID-19: The Hong Kong experience.
General practitioners play a significant part in the COVID-19 pandemic by providing whole-person and patient-centred care during this time of crisis.
abstract: General practitioners play a significant part in the COVID-19 pandemic by providing whole-person and patient-centred care during this time of crisis.

similar.title: Looking out for yourself and those around you.
text: Looking out for yourself and those around you.

The coronavirus outbreak is having a profound impact on society, including the veterinary industry. As we meet the challenges the outbreak poses, Rosie Allister, Vetlife Helpline Manager, reminds us to look after ourselves and those around us.
abstract: The coronavirus outbreak is having a profound impact on society, including the veterinary industry. As we meet the challenges the outbreak poses, Rosie Allister, Vetlife Helpline Manager, reminds us to look after ourselves and those around us.

similar.title: Looking after yourself and others.
text: The global Covid-19 outbreak is having a profound impact on everyone, including people in the veterinary profession. Public health and government advice for some to self isolate and for all of us to increase social distancing poses huge challenges for the industry and its people, as well as clients and patients. Here, Vetlife Helpline manager.
abstract: The global Covid-19 outbreak is having a profound impact on everyone, including people in the veterinary profession. Public health and government advice for some to self isolate and for all of us to increase social distancing poses huge challenges for the industry and its people, as well as clients and patients. Here, Vetlife Helpline manager.
